_sText:
*********8 PLEASE USE ie TO UPLOAD ASSESMENTS AS THEY DONT SEEM TO BE WORKING IN FIREFOX ATM, THANK YOU! *************
After further playtesting i have modified de_dust_small to fix gameplay balance and increase detail. change log: + Temple front entrance +more general detail +player clips +cubemaps ~Moved some crates ~temple inside
The result of these changes mean less grenade spam, rediced sightlines from B and improved balance !!!Nav file created by chizbone!!! http://www.fpsbanana.com/members/55178 A Small Team based bomb map, based on the dust style. two bomb points, best with 6 to 12 players, but supports up to 32! The map supports all styles of game play and has a mix of indoor and outdoor locations, the map is mostly outdoor. I have made the bombsites quite interesting, they have a good mix of open space and hiding spots. also they have scripted explosions!

I hope you enjoy it and leave me feedback! have fun!
